ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(NOT(BEGINS(Account_ID__c, "GB")),BEGINS(Account_ID__c, "GBS")),TEXT(Type)="Active", TEXT(Owning_Country__c) = "United Kingdom", CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "Head Office"), INCLUDES(TF_Current_Provider__c,"Premier Tax Free"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Account ID must be in the correct format.
